alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 2:29PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT/430 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Oregon, including the following county, Malheur. * WHEN...Until 530 PM MDT /430 PM PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 329 PM MDT /229 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ontario, Nyssa, Vale, Adrian, Keeney Pass and Owyhee. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
